## Development Setup

1. Fork the repo and clone it.
2. (Optional) Create a virtual environment:
   ```bash
   python -m venv venv
   source venv/bin/activate  # or venv\Scripts\activate on Windows

	3.	Install dependencies:
pip install -r requirements.txt
